1 #include "ros/ros.h"
2 #include "yaml-cpp/yaml.h"
3 
10 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
11  //Init ROS Node
12  ros::init(argc, argv, "load_config");
13  ros::Time::init();
14 
15  //Seek file and load it
16  std::string config_file;
17  ros::Rate loop(1000);
18 
19  while (!ros::param::has("/pumpkin/_config_file"))
20  loop.sleep();
21 
22  ros::param::get("/pumpkin/_config_file", config_file);
23 
24  YAML::Node config_load;
25  try {
26  config_load = YAML::LoadFile(config_file);
27  } catch (YAML::BadFile &ex) {
28  ROS_FATAL("Error loading file: %s", ex.what());
29  }
30  ROS_INFO("Opening config file: %s", config_file.c_str());
31  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue config_save;
32  //Iterates for group part
33  for (YAML::const_iterator it_cluster = config_load.begin(); it_cluster != config_load.end(); ++it_cluster)
34  {
35  const std::string &cluster = it_cluster->first.as<std::string>();
36  if (cluster == "ros_rate") {
37  config_save["ros_rate"] = it_cluster->second.as<double>();
38  continue;
39  }
40  //Iterate through parts
41  for (YAML::const_iterator it_part = it_cluster->second.begin(); it_part != it_cluster->second.end(); ++it_part)
42  {
43  const std::string &part = it_part->first.as<std::string>();
44  //Iterate through devices
45  for (YAML::const_iterator it_dev = it_part->second.begin(); it_dev != it_part->second.end(); ++it_dev)
46  {
47  const std::string &dev = it_dev->first.as<std::string>();
48  //Iterare through properties
49  for (YAML::const_iterator it_prop = it_dev->second.begin(); it_prop != it_dev->second.end(); ++it_prop)
50  {
51  config_save[dev][cluster][part][it_prop->first.as<std::string>()] = it_prop->second.as<uint16_t>();
52  //ROS_INFO("Creating param [%s] with value: %d", ros_param_name.str().c_str(), it_prop->second.as<uint16_t>());
53  }
54  }
55  }
56  }
57 
58  ros::param::set("/pumpkin/config", config_save);
59 
60  return 0;
61 }
